const path = require('path');
const mtdConfig = require('./mtd.config.js');

module.exports = {
  entry: {
    lowcode: path.resolve(__dirname,'./lib/lowcode/index.js'),
  },
  output: {
    library: mtdConfig.lowcode.outputName,
    libraryTarget: 'umd',
    filename: 'lowcode.umd.js',
    path: path.resolve(__dirname,'./lib/lowcode'),
  }
}
